data.text: Ia oragh! Ekiam, a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim,
A men mɨdorozir gumazir gavgaviba ko mɨdorozir gumazir igharaziba sara batuegham,
Egh a uaghan mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir ekiaba ko, gavmanɨn gumazir ekiaba ko, gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba atrivim ganɨdiba, a bar me batuegham.
Egh kɨ pura otarir igiaba ateghtɨ, me Jerusalem ko Judan gumazir dapanibar otivigham.
Egh gumazamiziba uarigh afighafighsɨ, igharaz darazi dɨkabɨnam.
Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn, gumazim uan aveghbuamra bagh mangɨ kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam,
Eghtɨ a kamaghɨn men akam ikaragham,
Jerusalem ko Juda, men mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ko ingangariba,
Egha me kotiaba barazir dughiabar, me ifongezir gumazamizibaram akurvagha igharaz darazi dɨkabɨri.
Gumazir Godɨn damazimɨn deraziba, ia me mɨkemegh,
Ezɨ gumazamizir kuraba, mevzika! Me bar ikuvigham!
O nan gumazamiziba, iavzika!
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God gumazamiziba bar men kotiaba baragha, me tuisɨghasav ami.
Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God uan gumazamizibar gumazir dapaniba ko gumazir aruaba ko kotiam gamua kamaghɨn me mɨgei,
Tina ia mɨkemezɨma, ia nan gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨsi, a?
Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia Saionɨn itir amizibar gan.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ekiam amizir kaba ivezir kuram me danigham.

Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn, Ekiam Saionɨn amizibar kurkaziba, bar me da ada adegham. Kar men kurkaziba: suer averiaba ko, segiaba ko, boavtariba ko, kuarir kurkaziba ko, dafarivteba ko, dapaniba aver nir avɨziba ko,
dapaniba kurkamin sorɨba ko, men daveriaba ko, mɨteba ko, forivtarir muziarir borer mughuriar aghuim zuim azuiba ko, bizir me suigha akavsiar arazibagh amiba ko,
ziaba itir ringɨn aghuiba ko, ngueba ko,

korotiar bar aghuiba ko, azenan azuir korotiar ruariba ko, saketɨn aghuiba ko, dagɨaba azuir forivtariba ko, guabar garir ganganiba ko, korotiar me nir ghurghurir aghuibar isamiziba ko, dapanir asuaba ko, inir aghuiba. Ekiam bar me dama da adegham.3:22-23 E datɨrɨghɨn deragha fozir puvatɨ, fomɨra ikezir kurkazir kaba, da ti manmaghɨra gari.
Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn, Saionɨn amiziba, fomɨra deragha kurti moghɨn ua kurukan kogham.
O Jerusalem, nɨn apaniba, nɨn mɨdorozir gumazir gavgaviba ko nɨn gumazir igharaziba mɨsoghtɨ,
Egh me nɨn biziba bar da inigham.
